#summary This article will tell you how to install cpedialog on appengine.
#labels cpedialog,install

= Preface =

Before you start to install cpedialog, you need to know what appengine is and what appengine can do. If you still have some uncertainty, please refer to: 
http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/whatisgoogleappengine.html

And we also recommend you to read the article for "Uploading an App" to appengine:
http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/appcfgpy.html

= Details =

== Download cpedialog ==
# Please download cpedialog from googlecode site and decompress it to a folder, for example, extract it to the "D:\My projects\cpedialog", make sure the file app.yaml is located in the folder cpedialog. 

# Please open the file app.yaml with some text editor (such as Microsoft Notpad). Change the applocation property in the first line to your own appengine app name.
 For example: 
        application: pchen   change to:
        application: your_app_name
